alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 6:19PM CDT until May 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River near Americus affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Americus. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs from along the river from Americus to Emporia. At 27.0 feet, Theater Road, also known as the Americus Road...2 miles south of Americus floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 26.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
